attributes.action: Dispense with all 'Lifeline' Charges for the frail and elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lifeline telecommunication charges are preventing some frail and elderly patients from having it installed.
In a so called modern society this is a national disgrace the Government are capable of funding.
At the same time they are funding
drugs to help people give up smoking, which in itself is a self inflicted harm, as opposed to growing old and infirm with need of instant calls to medical attention.
